: : Kup / Rodimus Prime : :

Kup decided to inform Nighlight on everything with Galvatron.

Kup: Well, lass, it all goes back to the Great Wars. You see after killing Optimus Prime in combat in 2005, Megatron was rebuilt into Galvatron by Unicron. Galvatron continued to lead the Decepticons from then on. Rodimus here lead the Autobots after he destroyed Unicron and saved Cybertron. Being that they were the opposing Commanders that kinda made them into arch rivals. This still exists to this day.

Rodimus Prime: The past continues to haunt me.....
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: airly2000 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:47 PM
  Subject: Re: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron


  Nighlight::

  "Who's... he?"asked Nightlight who wasn't sure if would be good time 
  to ask. She never had seen Rodimus so upset.


  --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  > : : Rodimus Prime / Kup : :
  > 
  > Rodimus recieved a comm message. When he activated it a holographic 
  image of Galvatron appeared. It was perjected by the comm system in 
  his wrist. After it ended Rodimus looked inraged.
  > 
  > Rodimus Prime: Ahhhhhhhh! I'll get youuuuuuuuuuuu!
  > 
  > Rodimus slams his fist intoa large boulder near by. The boulder 
  crumbles around the Autobot's fist.
  > 
  > Rodimus Prime: He thinks this is fun, Kup. When it comes down to 
  just him and I, I'll take him down for good. I didn't get it done 
  before, but I'll make sure of it now...
  > 
  > Kup: Calm down, lad. I know how you feel. i've been with you a long 
  time Rody, I've seen all the crap he's done. You'll get him, and I'll 
  be the first to congradulate you.
  > 
  > Rodimus Prime: Thanks old friend.
  >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   From: aerosmith60@c... 
  >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
  >   Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 7:40 PM
  >   Subject: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron
  > 
  > 
  >   Galvatron saw  Quilldart jet towards the base. "Good no doubt the 
  other two are not far behind." He sent a comm to Rodimus. A 
  holographic image of himself would display. "I am so glad Rodimus we 
  could come to terms. As for our one on one battle. Dont you worry. 
  That will happen in due time. Until then best of luck my old friend. 
  I havent had this much fun since our little unicron 
  adventure...wouldnt you agree?" He ended the comm and turned back to 
  the map. He had his three blips on the screen. 
  >         Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
  >               ADVERTISEMENT
  >              
  >        
  > 
  >   Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of 
  Service.
